answers.answer: Some of these symptoms are common to diabetes, others are not. Sometimes it's easy to think you have something if you are worried about it. But what you should do is get tested by the doctor, because it is very easy to find out if you have diabetes. Let's hope you don't, and then you will be releaved,  but if you do, diabetes is a condition that can be managed and they are learning more about it all the time.

question: im 14 and my father had diabetes and so dos his mother/my grandma, and i have a friend with diabetes and everything that she experienced whell first noticing she had it is now happaning to me, i have a sharp pain were my pancreus is located also i have been more thirsty then usual and i have been makeing more trips to the bathroom, also my legs have been hurting for about 2 weeks now, also i have been having terrible headaces and i have been craveing sugar for about 3 weeks constintly now, and i have been haveing stomace aces off and on for about a week now, please help.
title: is this diabetes?
